title: Supervise an Unmooring Operation
description: A vessel is ready to depart. The mooring gang supervisor must oversee the release of the mooring lines.

tasks.description: Receive the order from the vessel pilot to 'single up', meaning to release all but a few essential lines.
tasks.expected_outcome: Supervisor gets the command to prepare for departure.

tasks.description: Direct the linesmen to release the mooring lines in the sequence requested by the pilot.
tasks.expected_outcome: The mooring lines are safely cast off the bollards.

tasks.description: Once the final line is released, confirm 'all lines gone' to the pilot and ensure all personnel are clear of the quay edge.
tasks.expected_outcome: The supervisor confirms the vessel is free and all personnel are safe.
